```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

df
```
```{r}
p01173_mod_z_1 <- df %>% 
  lm(z(loss.of.control...RT) ~ z(age) + z(pursuit.rotor.task...time.on.target) + 
       z(prob.monitor...accuracy) + z(NFC), .)

export_ols(p01173_mod_z_1, 
           key_effects = c("z(age)", "z(pursuit.rotor.task...time.on.target)", 
                           "z(prob.monitor...accuracy)", "z(NFC)"))
```
